Currently have teams using Asana, Trello, and spreadsheets.\n\nWe've narrowed to monday.com vs Wrike based on:\n• Cross-department visibility\n• Enterprise security features (SSO, audit logs)\n• Scalability for 200+ users\n• Resource management and capacity planning\n• Advanced reporting and analytics\n• Change management (ease of adoption)\n\nWrike's enterprise features look more mature, but monday.com's interface is so much better. Which matters more at scale?"]}]}]
